text: Katonda teyali w'akuleka bakkiriza kwâ€™ekyo kyemuliko okugyako ngamaze okwawula ababi mu balungi, era Katonda teyali waakubalaga ebyo ebitalabika, naye mazima ddala Katonda alonda mu babaka be oyo gwaba ayagadde, kale mukkirize Katonda nababakabe, ate singa mukkiriza nemutya (Katonda) mujja kufuna empeera enzito
